title: The Soul
description: ‘The Soul’ tells the story of a woman’s self-discovery and awakening. Thirty years old married Cecilia Spencer couldn’t forget the mysterious stranger she saw on holiday, the infatuation grew stronger against her better judgement day by day, forcing her to question her seemingly perfect life. Fate brings them together again, resulting in a passionate affair. This newfound spark lights a fire in Cecilia’s soul and leads her on a very different path in her life, but how far she is willing to go to save her soul? This is a tale of a toxic marriage, love, adultery, passion, and ultimate sacrifice.
author: Cecilia Spencer
